mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post (user_id, board_id, no, title, content) VALUES ((SELECT id FROM user ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 1), #{board_id}, (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(no)+1, 1) FROM post AS p WHERE board_id=#{board_id}), #{title}, #{content})
